name: cronos-lambda-template
description: This is just a template - replace with your own description

scripts.clean: rm -rf build/ && rm -rf cdk.out && yarn clean:src && yarn clean:stacks
scripts.local:ecoa-analyzer: cross-env RUN_LOCAL_LAMBDA=1 npx cdk synth ecoa-analyzer-alert-* --no-staging --profile cronos > template.yaml
scripts.aws:ecoa-analyzer: cross-env RUN_LOCAL_LAMBDA=0 npx cdk synth ecoa-analyzer-alert-* --no-staging --profile cronos > template.yaml
scripts.aws:deploy:ecoa-analyzer: yarn cdk deploy ecoa-analyzer-alert-* --require-approval never --profile cronos
scripts.local:hello-world: cross-env RUN_LOCAL_LAMBDA=1 npx cdk synth hello-world-* --no-staging --profile cronos > template.yaml
scripts.aws:hello-world: cross-env RUN_LOCAL_LAMBDA=0 npx cdk synth hello-world-* --no-staging --profile cronos > template.yaml
scripts.aws:deploy:hello-world: yarn cdk deploy hello-world-* --require-approval never --profile cronos
